question: Where can I find info on how to embed a quiz or poll in a Proze email?
answer: You can find instructions on the Proze training pages here:https://m1.proze.io/site/proze-training/posts/polls---quizzes

question: Where do I view quiz results?
answer: You can find quiz results by clicking Library>Quizzes. Here you will see a list of all of your quizzes. Clicking on the number under total submissions will bring up the results page where you can further drill down on your results

question: What types of interactive content can be included in an email?
answer: You can include bookmarks, ratings, audio clips or podcasts, polls and quizzes, image carousels, countdown clocks, and dynamic video backgroundsâ€”all rendered directly in the email interface.
